lines: I'm $age years old and I'm passionate about what I do.
Besides programming, I like Photography, Video Editing, Arduino/Lego Ev3, Hacking(Kali), among others.

I usually dive headfirst into new projects and I'm very dedicated, I've been studying everything about computers since I was very young, but recently(2022) I started working in the field at 17 years old.

trajectory.subtitle: Trajectory
trajectory.title: How did I end up here
8 years: Most of the time playing and watching Youtube
13 years: Took a robotics course(public/private partnership), Lego Ev3.
Learned Python programming, Basic C#(for Unity), also block programming with Contruct 2.
Also learned video/image editing with Premiere, After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop among others. Knew the basics of 3d modeling with 3Ds max and Blender.
15 years: Working at Jornal OCP as video/photo editor, production of live programs.
During work, solidified knowledge with editing with the Adobe package, and also learned to use and configure the software for live programs, vMix(main) and OBS.
16 years: Took a course at Senai of Systems Development integrated with high school.

Hacked 4 outsourced systems from Senai:
  • Mangahigh(math activities);
  • Essay system;
  • GeekieOne - License activation;
  • GeekieOne - Tests and activities.
17 years: Started working as a Backend programmer at BeMobile, starting from a project in AdonisJS, Working mainly with Laravel.
Later, took the position of Mobile programmer(React Native) and as needed Front end.
Gave a lecture at the company on hacking and data protection.
Found vulnerability in a large company platform in the region.

Created alone softwares like:
  • AutoZap - AI to respond by Whatsapp;
  • GuiaJaraguá - Virtual guide, closed due to lack of structure;
  • Creation of Merlin software company - lack of structure.

In the last year, as a personal desire, I've been trying to create something of my own, like the softwares listed above.

descriptions.decorandoaleiseca: Study site for legal area contestants
descriptions.zap-auto: Platform for automating messages on whatsapp
